dataprovider.description: Démo Tableau de bord des ventes

sqlprovider.query: select id, message, tag, tweetDate, concat(user, ' - ', uniqueName) user, uniqueName, if(tag='demoup','green', 'red') as color from tweets order by tweetDate desc;
select id, message, tag, tweetDate, concat(user, ' - ', uniqueName) user, uniqueName, if(tag='demoup','green', 'red') as color from tweets where salesforce=false order by tweetDate desc;
select id, message, tag, tweetDate, concat(user, ' - ', uniqueName) user, uniqueName, if(tag='demoup','green', 'red') as color from tweets where salesforce=true order by tweetDate desc;
